comments.author: examplens
comments.body: you are not so much a beginner on this forum, I believe you know about the micro earning section https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=212.0there are all the discussions about such sites and the possibilities of micro-earning Bitcoin. there are certainly reasons why a separate section of the forum has been set aside for this, given that there are a huge number of "paid to click" or "paid to survey" sites, I believe that one of the reasons not to overwhelm the rest of the forum with such posts.OP, move this to the proper section.
